eventList1Cards.title: Wantirna Advice Night
eventList1Cards.description: Considering nursing, early education, apprenticeships or vocational courses? Find out more and let our specialist staff answer all your questions.

eventList1Cards.title: Hawthorn Advice Night
eventList1Cards.description: From A to Z, all our bachelor degrees, diplomas and certificates will be represented here. Get advice and even apply on the spot.

eventList1Cards.title: Postgrad Advice Night
eventList1Cards.description: Thinking about returning to study or keen to kickstart a new career? Have all your questions answered at our event at Rydges Melbourne CBD.
